entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 7:30 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa falling
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -5.8°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 6 except minus 3 along the coast.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening with flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6 except minus 3 along the coast. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 3 except zero along the coast.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 3 except zero along the coast. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Periods of snow and local blowing snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 7 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 07 January 2023
